name: Generic Worker Man
description:
This is a game of stick collecting. Nothing more.

There are 3 possible endings:

1. Gravedigger

2. The ol' bush

3. Glitched Escapist

Note: this game was made for the mini game jam and the theme was crime. there was also a limitation that said that pausing had to be a core mechanic of the game. i did not know that until the last day of the jam though sadly. while pausing may not be the core mechanic of the game, it does give you one of the endings. plz dont delete my game hehe.

the music for the game was made by a  great pal of mine! here is his youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCogcP7aRTGIyGzr-oTuhAgw
